runs.comm: looped into the right-hander from round the wicket, pushed from the crease towards mid-on, Barath wants one but gets sent back
Simmons plays behind square off the back foot
flighted delivery drifting into Barath from round the wicket, he tries to drive but mis-times it on the leg side
punched off the back foot towards the off side
played off the front foot towards midwicket, the fielder at mid-on runs to his right to field
Simmons tries to cut one that is a bit too full and a bit too close to off stump, he gets beaten
short and wide outside off stump, Barath sits on the back foot and cuts hard, hitting the ball through the gap at backward point
pushed towards short cover
drives down the ground
too straight from Shafiul and Barath tries to glance to the boundary, he misses but the ball brushes pad and goes to fine leg anyway
Barath tries to run it to third man but gets an inside edge past the stumps
another one too far outside off stump, Barath flays at it but can't reach it
short of a length but straighter, Barath plays off the back foot towards point
pushed gently off the front foot towards cover
Barath charges and lofts Razzak over mid-on, he hasn't hit it far enough though. The ball falls a few feet inside the boundary and the fielder from mid-on reaches it
fired down leg side
tossed up on middle and off, Barath lunges forward, gets down on one knee and slog-sweeps to the square-leg boundary
loud appeal for lbw, Barath seemed like he wanted to sweep again but changed his mind and was hit on the pad, maybe slipping down leg
he's cut that from right in front of the stumps and placed it towards third man, risky shot
he tries to do it again, this time from just outside off, and the bottom edge goes past the stumps
short of a length and straight, Simmons plays it off the back foot through midwicket
short and wide outside off, Barath tries to carve it over point but gets beaten. There was a spongy, tennis-ball bounce that took it over the bat
defended towards the bowler
played towards cover for a single
short of a length outside off, dabbed towards short third man
bowled flat and fast into the right-hander from round the wicket, Barath gets hit on the pad

caught at mid-on! Barath comes down the pitch and heaves, aiming for the leg-side boundary. He mis-hits it high in the air towards mid-on, where Tamim judges the catch well. The former captain and vice-captain combine for the first wicket
defended on the front foot
defended on the front foot towards short cover
Simmons gets down on one knee and sweeps, chipping the ball over short fine leg and to the boundary
played through cover point
the batsman makes room by moving towards leg and the bowler follows him, the ball is pushed towards cover
length ball, smashed. Simmons lines it up and lofts over mid-on, timing it superbly
shorter length, Simmons waits on the back foot and pulls to the fielder at deep square leg
and that is some way to get off the mark. A short ball just sits up and Samuels swivels and pulls it flat over the deep square leg boundary
Samuels makes room by moving towards leg and hits the ball from just outside off towards cover point
he clears the backward point boundary this time. Making room to a fullish ball and carving it powerfully over the point boundary with a fierce swing of the bat
played off the back foot towards short third man
that's off the pad, towards short third man for a leg bye
defended on the front foot towards backward point, that was slower through the air from the bowler
this is quicker, and the batsman plays it towards cover for one
Simmons makes room and cuts hard, the fielder at point is Ashraful and he dives to cut it off
nudged off the front foot towards short fine leg
length ball outside off, the batsman tries to drive but gets an edge towards third man
Samuels moves his front foot towards leg and bashes the ball through cover
full and straight, Samuels moves forward and towards the off and drives to mid-on
full ball just outside off, driven in the air over point to the fielder in the deep
played with an open face towards short third man
a slower ball outside off, the batsman tries to push towards cover point but gets beaten
Samuels moves forward, waits for the ball to angle into him, and opens the face to guide towards short third man
played off the back foot towards short third man
nudged off the pads towards short fine leg for a single
the batsman comes down the pitch and plays the ball towards the bowler, nearly yorked himself
he executes the shot better this time, Simmons comes down again, gets to the pitch of the ball and lofts it clear over the wide long-on boundary
lbw! Simmons plays back to this one and moves across his stumps to push on the on side. He gets hit on the pad by a flat ball that skids on and beats the bat
full ball, driven firmly to the bowler
played back to the bowler once again
tossed up on off and middle, driven from the crease to cover
flat ball on off stump skids through, Russell defends on the off side
driven to long-off for a single
that's too far down leg side, Samuels tries to slog sweep but can't connect
driven from the crease to long-on
played through midwicket
Samuels opens his stance to try and hit on the leg side, it's a slower ball and he pushes it towards cover
short ball, Russell tries to hook but can't connect
slower ball outside off stump, played towards third man with an open face
the batsman makes room and cuts hard towards deep point
slower ball outside off stump, Russell pulls too early and has finished the shot by the time the ball reaches him
tossed up on middle, driven towards long-on
nearly in the blockhole on off and middle, driven to cover from the crease
no room to hit on the leg side, Russell drives to long-on
Samuels opens his stance, makes room and drives the ball hard though extra cover, beating the fielder in the deep
full length on middle and leg, driven off the pads towards deep midwicket
defended from the crease towards the bowler
full ball around off stump, driven off the back foot towards deep cover
slower ball bowled full outside off, the batsman tries to play towards point and is beaten
driven to wide long-on
full and straight, driven to long-off
full and straight once again, the batsman drills it along the ground straight past the bowler, Tamim runs to his left from long-on and dives to cut off the boundary
played off the back foot to long-on
width offered outside off and Samuels cuts hard off the back foot, beating the fielder at backward point and third man
played off the back foot through cover point
Russell's holed out to cover. His struggle's over. He came down the pitch and flayed at the ball, trying to hit it with a flat bat. He skied it to the edge of the circle
bowled flat on off stump, driven to cover
defended on the front foot
short delivery outside off, cut off the back foot towards deep point
the yorker, Samuels keeps it out
Samuels walks out and towards the off side and lifts a full ball off his pads over the square-leg boundary
played towards square leg
defended towards the bowler
defended towards the bowler once again, five overs to go
Samuels tries to heave a flat and straight ball over midwicket but gets beaten
played towards cover for a quick single
too full and Darren Bravo, on one knee, gets under it and lofts the ball cleanly over deep midwicket. West Indies go past 100
quicker ball outside off, Bravo tries to steer to third man but gets beaten
strays down leg side
that's plumb. The line was middle and the length was good. The ball skidded through to Bravo, who moved across his stumps and closed the face to play towards the leg side. He missed and was a goner.
driven from the crease towards the off side, the bowler moves to his left and fields
full ball on off and middle, the batsman makes room and hits the ball down the ground
slower ball outside off, cut off the back foot to point
Samuels slogs the ball towards long-on, just the single
short ball and Hyatt moves forward, then arches back and pulls the ball through midwicket

lbw! Hyatt moves across his stumps, gets down low and tries to paddle a full ball past the wicketkeeper. He misses and the ball brushes the pad and beats Mushfiqur, who dived to his left. The umpire had the finger raised before the ball reached the boundary.
short ball, which is pulled to deep midwicket
caught at long-off. Sammy's gone for a duck. He stayed in his crease and lofted the ball straight to Nasir Hossain. Didn't hit it with much power.
driven towards deep cover and Samuels brings up 50 off 37 balls
played towards long-on for a single
superbly bowled yorker. The batsman is forced to defend
Samuels comes down and lofts the ball flat to long-off. It reaches the fielder on the bounce
full toss, Ramdin had backed away and the bowler followed him. He pushed it towards long-on
beaten outside the off stump, pitched middle and spun away from the right-handeer
played off the back foot towards cover
short ball and Samuels can only pull it along the ground to deep square leg
short ball, Ramdin comes forward and slaps the ball through cover
Ramdin comes forward and tries to sweep, he misses and gets hit on the pad
another short ball, Samuels waits on the back foot and heaves it high and far over the backward square leg boundary
pushed off the front foot towards long-on
caught behind! The ball was full and wide outside off. It was also a little slower. Sameuls waited in his crease, reached out for it and tried to flay through point. He nicked it to Mushfiqur
pushed to cover point for his first international run
the slower ball bowled wide outside off, Ramdin hits the ball through point

caught at long-off! It was a length delivery outside off stump. Brathwaite clears his front foot and swings hard. He makes good contact but doesn't get enough elevation, timing the ball straight to Nasir Hossain.
slower ball outside off stump, hit off the back foot to cover
